channel.title: Eclipse [639] Dicing and Donator Zone
channel.description: Was wondering if there was anyway to add dicing or a donator zone on to a Eclipse 639 server and if there is if someone would be kind enough to show. Thanks!

item.title: Eclipse [639] Dicing and Donator Zone
item.dc:creator: @Rawr_is_me Rawr is me
item.description:
@Rawr_is_me wrote:

Do you happen to know any cords i could use for a zone? Like the regular donator/staff zone cords where its in a small room with no doors?

Sorry i’m probably really annoying

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse [639] Dicing and Donator Zone
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

Yep!

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse [639] Dicing and Donator Zone
item.dc:creator: @Rawr_is_me Rawr is me
item.description:
@Rawr_is_me wrote:

[quote=“pray4urlife, post:8, topic:441296”]Ok np, i’ll try to explain through here then. Ok so what your gonna do is look for the place your wanting then add a command to commands.java so when a donator types in say “donorzone” or “donatorzone” it will send them to the place you picked. Ok now with that command you need to set the rights were only donators can do so it would be something like this
Ex:

Then you will add your shops to the custom donator zone. I might be missing some steps but ya that will get your started. Gl![/quote]Thank you so much!

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse [639] Dicing and Donator Zone
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

Ok np, i’ll try to explain through here then. Ok so what your gonna do is look for the place your wanting then add a command to commands.java so when a donator types in say “donorzone” or “donatorzone” it will send them to the place you picked. Ok now with that command you need to set the rights were only donators can do so it would be something like this
Ex:

Then you will add your shops to the custom donator zone. I might be missing some steps but ya that will get your started. Gl!

Read full topic
